sql.if: AND (TO_CHAR(A.EXAM_STT_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN #{exam_ym} || '010000' AND #{exam_ym} || '312359' OR TO_CHAR(A.EXAM_END_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN #{exam_ym} || '010000' AND #{exam_ym} || '312359' OR #{exam_ym} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.EXAM_STT_DTTM, 'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(A.EXAM_END_DTTM, 'YYYYMM'))

mapper.select:
SELECT /* ExamBasiMap.getExamBasiCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_EXAM_BASI A WHERE 1=1
AND A.BZPT_DIV = #{bzpt_div}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'EXM' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(SEQ_COMMON.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT /* ExamBasiMap.insertExamBasi */ INTO TB_EXAM_BASI (EXAM_ID, EMSH_ID, EXAM_NM, EXAM_EXPI, PRBM_ARNM_CD , EXAM_PRGR_STAT_CD, EXAM_STT_DTTM, EXAM_END_DTTM, BZPT_DIV , CNTR_CD, RGSR_ID, RGSN_DTTM, AMND_ID, AMNT_DTTM) VALUES (#{exam_id}, #{emsh_id}, #{exam_nm}, #{exam_expi}, #{prbm_arnm_cd} , '10', #{exam_stt_dttm}, #{exam_end_dttm}, #{bzpt_div} , #{cntr_cd}, #{rgsr_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{amnd_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
mapper.select: SELECT /* ExamBasiMap.getExamBasiMyPageCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_EXAM_BASI A JOIN TB_EXAM_TRPR B ON A.EXAM_ID = B.EXAM_ID AND B.EXAM_TRPR_ID = #{exam_trpr_id} WHERE 1=1

if.test: dateType != null and dateType != '' and period != '0101'

if.if: AND A.EXAM_STT_DTTM BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(#{startd}, '-', '') || '0000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(#{endd}, '-', '') || '2359', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')
AND A.EXAM_END_DTTM BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(#{startd}, '-', '') || '0000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(#{endd}, '-', '') || '2359', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')

mapper.select: SELECT /* ExamBasiMap.getSearchExamBasiCount */ COUNT(DISTINCT(A.EXAM_ID)) FROM TB_EXAM_BASI A , TB_EXAM_TRPR B WHERE A.EXAM_ID = B.EXAM_ID AND A.CNTR_CD = B.CNTR_CD

SELECT /* ExamBasiMap.getSearchExamBasiList */ A.EXAM_ID, A.EXAM_NM FROM TB_EXAM_BASI A , TB_EXAM_TRPR B WHERE A.EXAM_ID = B.EXAM_ID AND A.CNTR_CD = B.CNTR_CD
GROUP BY A.EXAM_ID, A.EXAM_NM
